00018 #ifndef _CVBAND_IMPL_H
00019 #define _CVBAND_IMPL_H
00020 
00021 #ifdef __cplusplus  /* wrapper to enable C++ usage */
00022 extern "C" {
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 #include <cvode/cvode_band.h>
00026 
00027 /*
00028  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00029  * Types: CVBandMemRec, CVBandMem                                
00030  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00031  * The type CVBandMem is pointer to a CVBandMemRec.
00032  * This structure contains CVBand solver-specific data.                
00033  * -----------------------------------------------------------------
00034  */                                                                
00035 
00036 typedef struct {
00037 
00038   long int b_n;           /* N = problem dimension                    */
00039 
00040   CVBandJacFn b_jac;      /* jac = Jacobian routine to be called      */
00041 
00042   long int b_ml;          /* b_ml = lower bandwidth of savedJ         */
00043   
00044   long int b_mu;          /* b_mu = upper bandwidth of savedJ         */ 
00045   
00046   long int b_storage_mu;  /* upper bandwith of M = MIN(N-1,b_mu+b_ml) */
00047   
00048   BandMat b_M;            /* M = I - gamma J, gamma = h / l1          */
00049   
00050   long int *b_pivots;     /* pivots = pivot array for PM = LU         */
00051   
00052   BandMat b_savedJ;       /* savedJ = old Jacobian                    */
00053   
00054   long int b_nstlj;       /* nstlj = nst at last Jacobian eval.       */
00055   
00056   long int b_nje;         /* nje = no. of calls to jac                */
00057   
00058   long int b_nfeB;        /* nfeB = no. of calls to f due to difference
00059                              quotient band Jacobian approximation     */
00060 
00061   void *b_J_data;         /* J_data is passed to jac                  */
00062 
00063   int b_last_flag;        /* last error return flag                   */
00064   
00065 } CVBandMemRec, *CVBandMem;
00066 
00067 /* Error Messages */
00068 
00069 #define MSGB_CVMEM_NULL "Integrator memory is NULL."
00070 
00071 #define MSGB_MEM_FAIL "A memory request failed."
00072 #define MSGB_BAD_SIZES "Illegal bandwidth parameter(s). Must have 0 <=  ml, mu <= N-1."
00073 #define MSGB_BAD_NVECTOR "A required vector operation is not implemented."
00074 #define MSGB_LMEM_NULL "CVBAND memory is NULL."
00075 #define MSGB_JACFUNC_FAILED "The Jacobian routine failed in an unrecoverable manner."
00076 
00077 #ifdef __cplusplus
00078 }
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 #endif
